headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Get 3X GTA$ and RP on Taxi Work
content:
Volunteer your services this week and shuttle Los Santosâ€™ citizens around the city for the Downtown Cab Co. in Taxi Work to earn 3X GTA$ and RP.

Entrepreneurial drivers can launch Taxi Work by purchasing the Taxi at 30% off this week.

Those without a Taxi can head to the Downtown Cab Co. marker on the map to jump in.
